meanings.sent1: The blueprint was carefully dimensioned to ensure accurate measurements.
meanings.sent2: The architect dimensioned the room to fit the new furniture perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The dimensioned cake was a hit at the party, fitting the theme perfectly.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit was dimensioned to match the vibrant colors of the sunset.
meanings.sent5: The artist dimensioned the painting with intricate details, bringing it to life.

meanings.definition: Having a specified dimension or dimensions.
meanings.sent1: The dimensioned box fit snugly in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent2: The dimensioned table was just the right size for the small kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The dimensioned puzzle was challenging to put together due to its unique shape.
meanings.sent4: The dimensioned garden was a beautiful display of different plant heights.
meanings.sent5: The dimensioned building stood out among the others with its unique shape.
